description: On Sunday, Hillary Rodham Clinton released a video featuring the stories of a diverse group of Americans to announce that she will seek the presidency for a second time.
title: Hillary Clinton’s Announcement Video
title_page: Hillary Clinton’s Announcement Video - Video - NYTimes.com
text: On Sunday, Hillary Rodham Clinton released a video featuring the stories of a diverse group of Americans to announce that she will seek the presidency for a second time.
